      • bringAllStudentsToTop

        public static void bringAllStudentsToTop(IStage stage)
        Brings all student menus and menu icons to the top of the environment.

      • generateStudentMenu

        public static StudentMenu generateStudentMenu(StudentRepresentation student,
                              IStage stage,
                              SynergyNetApp app)
        Creates a student menu for a given student representation.
        Parameters:
        student - The student representation to create a student menu for.
        Returns:
        The student menu item created for the corresponding student.

      • login

        public static StudentMenu login(java.lang.String studentID,
                IStage stage,
                SynergyNetApp app)
        Will log in a student with the supplied ID. When a student is logged in their representation is retrieved from the database service using their ID and a menu for the student is created and positioned randomly in the environment. When a student logs in their personal gallery is also created and populated using details from their database entry.
        Parameters:
        studentID - ID of the student to be logged in.
        Returns:
        The student menu item created for the corresponding student.

      • logout

        public static void logout(java.lang.String studentID,
          IStage stage)
        Logs out a specific student from the environment and removes their menu. When logging out their details, such as items and feedback stored in their personal gallery, are updated in the database.
        Parameters:
        studentID - ID of the student to be logged out.

      • logoutAll

        public static void logoutAll(IStage stage)
        Logs out all students in the environment and removes their menus.

      • logoutAllOfClass

        public static void logoutAllOfClass(java.lang.String className,
                    IStage stage)
        Logs out all students belonging to a specific class.
        Parameters:
        className - Name of the class for which all students belonging to it should be logged out.

      • setAbilityToAddContentFromGallery

        public static void setAbilityToAddContentFromGallery(boolean allowGalleryAdd)
        Sets whether students representations present in the environment can add content from their personal galleries to the applications.
        Parameters:
        allowGalleryAdd - true = items can be added from personal galleries. false = items cannot be added from personal galleries.
